title: Tasty Chicken Samosa Recipe
content:
Chicken Samosa.Super crispy and flavourful samosa recipe with a different taste filling. This taste great with a cup of coffee or tea.

Samosa is one of my all-time favourite snacks. It is recently I discovered readymade frozen samosa sheets and I am love with it. you just make filling for the samosa and stuff them in this and fry them or bake them.

 

Chicken Samosa Recipe

Prep time: 10 mins

Cook time: 2 mins

Total time: 12 mins

 

Recipe type: Brunch

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 4 servings

 

Ingredients

Samosa Patti as needed

Oil for deep frying

All-Purpose flour / Maida - 2 tablespoons

Water - 2 to 3 tablespoons

 

FOR FILLING:

Oil - 1 tablespoon

Onion - 1 large chopped finely

Green Chillies - 2 chopped finely

Curry leaves a sprig

Ginger Garlic Paste - 1 tablespoon

Chicken Breast - 2 cooked and cut into small pieces

Turmeric Powder - 1 teaspoon

Salt to taste

Chilli Powder - 1 teaspoon

Garam Masala Powder - 1 teaspoon

All-Purpose Flour / Maida - 1 tablespoon

Chicken Stock - ½ cup

 

Instructions

First Make the filling. Heat oil in a pan,

Add in onion, curry leaves, ginger-garlic paste and green chillies. Saute for 2 mins.

Add salt and spice powders and mix well.

Add in all-purpose flour and saute for a min.

Add in Chicken stock and cooked chicken and mix well. Set aside to cool.

Take a samosa Patti and spoon some filling in.

Now fold like samosa and seal the edges with flour and water paste.

Deep fry till golden brown.

Serve it.

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
